text:
Improvement pill here some of you
probably already know that I used to run

a sales office back in a day it was a
position that I worked my butt off

obtaining and I really thought once I
got to manage my own office that my

workload would decrease that I would be
making way more money and that I would

be happier but I was dead wrong because
after being handed the office I found

myself putting in almost a hundred hours
of work every single week a significant

increase from the 80 hours I was used to
beforehand which was already quite a lot

and it was this intense workload that
caused me to wake up one day in bed with

the decision suggest not show up instead
I decided to turn off all the

notifications on my phone and go back to
sleep I'm not proud of it at all

but that's essentially how I quit by
getting burnt sow and giving up over the

course of the next couple of weeks I
suffered from an intense lack of

motivation I had already come across the
idea of building passive income streams

online a couple of months prior and
decided that that was what I wanted but

for some reason I just couldn't motivate
myself to get out of bed and actually

start working on building the business I
went from being a guy who had the work

ethic of a machine to a guy who could
barely get himself to shower let alone

put in the hours needed to build an
online business I desperately needed to

figure out a way to motivate myself to
do things and take action again so

here's what I decided to do I decided to
stick to a part of my old morning

routine it was a simple routine wake up
shower shave put on my suit grab my bag

and walk out the front door the only
difference was that instead of heading

to my old office I decided to walk to
the local Starbucks and worked there

instead and by simply doing this one
thing I suddenly found myself motivated

to work again whenever I was all washed
up and looking sharp with my suit on I

was filled with motivation and I was
able to spend a good five to six hours

working in that Starbucks I did this
every single day and by the end of the

year I had built a passive income stream
making a little over $1,000 a month what

I had accidentally stumbled on here is
what I like to call the Showtime trick

see there are certain things you can do
certain routines or outfits you can put

on that will essentially trick you into
entering a certain state of mind

almost like an actor putting on a
costume before getting ready to perform

in front of the camera or an athlete do
a special ritual before their game for

example LeBron James will throw some
chalk dust up in the air before playing

ball Usain Bolt's will spend time
talking to someone about things he likes

like cars and music before each race and
Michael Jordan always wore his old the

University of North Carolina shorts
underneath his Bulls uniform during his

games all of these unique rituals are
essentially ways for us to trick our

mind into putting our game face on it's
a way for us to tell our brain and body

hey it's show time
it's time for us to act a certain way

and give it your all now I know some of
you are probably thinking well

improvement bill that's nice and all but
I don't have a weird ritual or outfit

that I can wear that will get me to act
or feel a certain way this Showtime

trick of yours doesn't apply to me well
the thing is none of us are born with

these rituals each and every single one
of those athletes we just talked about

developed their own ritual over time you
have to build an association in your

mind almost like how you would build the
habit which quick little side note if

you haven't already heard my happy
building program has been a huge success

so far we're gonna relaunch the program
pretty soon if you want to join the

mailing list to get updates on that all
you have to do is click on the link in

the description box below back to the
topic at hand

like I said obtaining a rich flow for
the Showtime drink can actually be very

simple all you need to do is purposely
go out of your way to create a new

ritual and make sure that you do
something special immediately after the

first 3 times let me give you an example
back when I first started going on dates

I would get extremely nervous
so I created a ritual in order to calm

my nerves down I would meditate and try
to be as present as possible during the

entire 30 to 45 minute train or bus ride
to the date spot and when I finally got

to my stop I would go out of my way to
have 3 short but fun interactions with

some strangers around me for example
sometimes I would crack a joke with the

bus driver give a high-five to a random
person or give a compliment to someone

walking down the street something like
hey nice jacket this helped me out a lot

because I knew that talking to strangers
made me less nervous and also since

these interactions were almost always
positive I would be in a good mood

before the date even started then after
the rituals over I made sure that I was

as fun and present as possible during
the date itself and after doing this

just three times it
came a ritual that I would do before

every first date I started feeling less
and less nervous each time because I

knew this ritual of mine would trick me
into being more fun and present here's

another example I only recently started
going to big networking events a couple

of years back and I did feel a bit
nervous because I was going to be in a

room where almost everyone else was far
more successful than I was it was

intimidating to say the least
so I created a little ritual that I

still stick to this day I washed up and
I suited up an hour before the event

started and then I blasted music in my
hotel room while dancing in front of the

mirror I did this for about thirty
minutes and then I made sure to go down

to the event and talk to as many people
as possible I think the first time I

went to one of these networking events I
must have spoken to at least a hundred

different people over the course of the
three days I was there after doing this

ritual two more times and other
networking events it's now become an

easy way for me to trick myself into
being more talkative and outgoing if you

want to trick yourself into doing things
all you have to do is create a ritual

make sure that you step outside of your
comfort zone and try harder than normal

your first three times and just like
that you will be able to answer a

Showtime whenever you want this episode
is sponsored by Harry's a large

percentage of the rituals I have
involved looking sharp which includes

getting a clean shave if you've ever
felt frustrated having to go out every

couple of weeks just to buy overpriced
low-quality blades that only end up

irritating your skin then Harry's is for
you they sent me their starter set which

includes a weighted handle with a nice
rubber grip a five blade razor cartridge

foaming shave gel and a travel cover to
protect your blades when you're on the

move what I like most about their blades
is the fact that they make their own

blades in Germany and the fact that
refills start at only two dollars I

really love how easy it is to shave
around the hard-to-reach spots on my

face without ever getting cut there's
nothing like getting a close and

comfortable shave every time go to WWE's
com4 slash improvement to redeem your

trial set for just three dollars you'll
get everything you need for a close

comfortable shave and you'll be
supporting my channel as well
besides that guys stay tuned
